price: ដូចេ្នះ អ្នកដែលធ្វើអំពើល្អសូម្បីមានទម្ងន់ប៉ុនលំអងធូលី ក៏គេនឹងឃើញវាដែរ។
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
